<title level="1" right="Action">[Recenter](/Actions.aspx?ID=1236) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 201

**Requirements** You're in a psychic duel and are trained in the skill matching the [psychic center](/Actions.aspx?ID=1235) you are changing to.

</column>

---

You adopt the psychic center matching the emotion of your choice. If you were already psychically centered, you lose your old psychic center when you adopt the new one.
